description: Data was generated from file metadata information from the GDC release 12 from June 2018. Aliquot are mapped to case information.
friendlyName: ALIQUOT IDS TO CASE IDS REL12

fields.description: Program name, eg TCGA or TARGET
fields.name: program_name

fields.description: ID of the Project -- e.g. TCGA-BRCA, TARGET-AML, etc
fields.name: project_id

fields.description: Submitter identifier, eg HCC1954, TCGA-ZX-AA5X, etc
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Accompanying sample type ID for the sample type
fields.name: sample_type_id

fields.description: Two-digit sample_type code which forms part of the sample barcode eg. 01,11,06, etc.
fields.name: sample_type

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), eg 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: aliquot_gdc_id

fields.description: Original TCGA aliquot barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode
